name: Teacher Hero
description:
Bahasa Indonesia
Mainkan gamenya dengan Klik objek, geret objek dan cocokkan dengan bayangan gambar yang berada di atasnya serta raihlah score sebanyak-banyak nya dan selamat bermain!

English
Play the game by clicking objects, dragging objects and matching them with the image shadows above them and get as many scores as possible and have fun playing!

Game Developer
M. Rafif Padantya W.
SMK Negeri 9 Malang
https://smkn9malang.sch.id/
